title: Aikatsu Friends!: Kagayaki no Jewel
original_name: アイカツフレンズ！～かがやきのジュエル～
opening_song: "Hitori ja Nai! (ひとりじゃない！)" by Aine Yuuki (Akane Matsunaga), Mio Minato (Ibuki Kido), Maika Chouno (Karen Miyama), Ema Hinata (Yui Ninomiya) from BEST FRIENDS! (eps 1-)
ending_song: "Be star" by Hibiki Tenshou (Yoko Hikasa ) from BEST FRIENDS (eps 1-)
sinopse: The story takes place two years after Aikatsu Friends! with Aine Yuuki now in high school. One day she has an encounter with the mysterious idol Hibiki Tenshou who wears the shining Jeweling Dress.
